title: Ticket #1799: condor_config_val -<daemon> queries daemon, even if no param specified
description: If the user runs 'condor_config_val -schedd', ccv will query the collector to find the schedd, then, when later parsing the remainder of the command line, will determine that it's missing parameters and will dump out usage. As far as I can tell, not a serious problem, but certainly less than optimal.
